layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 644x19
          text run at (0,0) width 644: "The selection should cover the all of the below text. There should be no blank between either C and F."

        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 34x19
          text run at (0,0) width 34: "ABC"

          LayoutText {#text} at (34,0) size 31x19
            text run at (34,0) width 31 RTL override: "DEF"

          text run at (65,0) width 29: "GHI"
